sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ProductBox :books="books"/>
</template>

<script>

import ProductBox from '@/components/ProductBox.vue'

export default
{
    name: "Books",

    components: 
    { 
      ProductBox
    },

    data(){

      return{

        books: null

      }
      
    },

    mounted(){

      this.books = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("books"))
      localStorage.setItem("page", "Livros")

    }

}

</script>
